name: part_008
file: tmp_【3DLIVE】紫咲シオン 5th Anniversary LIVE【#紫咲シオン5周年記念⁠】 [KdFYu1feK30]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_008.mov

scenes.description: Shion and Aqua perform 'Tower of Flowers' in a school classroom setting decorated with colorful chalk drawings.
Shion sings a solo ballad, 'Until your night dawns,' while sitting on a glowing crescent moon in a starry night sky.
scenes.song_name: Anata no Yoru ga Akeru made

subtitles.original: 光で影が生まれる
subtitles.english: Light gives birth to shadows

subtitles.english: Sing and let me hear

subtitles.original: この話の続き
subtitles.english: the continuation of this story

subtitles.original: 連れて行って
subtitles.english: Take me away

subtitles.original: 見たことない星まで
subtitles.english: to a star I've never seen

subtitles.original: 誰の手も声も届かない
subtitles.english: No one's hand or voice can reach

subtitles.original: 高くそびえ立った塔の上
subtitles.english: Atop a high, towering tower

subtitles.original: 飛ばす風船 カモフラージュ
subtitles.english: Flying balloons, camouflage

subtitles.original: 僕は君に笑ってほしいんだ
subtitles.english: I want you to smile

subtitles.original: 満たされない穴は未完成の愛か
subtitles.english: Is the unfilled hole an incomplete love?

subtitles.original: 今は欺いたポーズで
subtitles.english: For now, in a deceptive pose

subtitles.original: これまでは運命的だったけど
subtitles.english: It has been fateful until now, but...

subtitles.original: 退屈な日々を蹴散らして
subtitles.english: Kicking away the boring days

subtitles.original: 君と二人で
subtitles.english: With just the two of us

subtitles.original: この街中を
subtitles.english: In this town

subtitles.original: 泳げたら
subtitles.english: If we could swim

subtitles.original: それはどれだけ素敵なことでしょう？
subtitles.english: How wonderful would that be?

subtitles.original: 出したことないほど
subtitles.english: More than I've ever put out

subtitles.original: 大きな
subtitles.english: A loud...

subtitles.original: 声でやっと君に
subtitles.english: ...voice finally to you

subtitles.original: 伝わる
subtitles.english: will reach

subtitles.original: 歪なくらいが
subtitles.english: Being a little distorted

subtitles.original: きっとちょうどいいよね
subtitles.english: is probably just right

subtitles.original: 世界の端と端を
subtitles.english: Connecting the edges of the world

subtitles.original: 結んで
subtitles.english: Together

subtitles.original: 窓に飾った貝殻なぞって
subtitles.english: Tracing the shells decorated on the window

subtitles.original: 一人の宇宙を旅して
subtitles.english: Traveling through my own universe alone

subtitles.original: それだけでも不自由ないけど
subtitles.english: Even that alone is not inconvenient, but...

subtitles.original: 僕は選んでみたいの
subtitles.english: I want to try choosing

subtitles.original: 高鳴る心 なぞだらけの空は
subtitles.english: A throbbing heart, the sky full of mysteries

subtitles.original: 安全なループを 今 掻き消して
subtitles.english: Erasing the safe loop now

subtitles.original: 君の手を握ってしまったら
subtitles.english: If I end up holding your hand

subtitles.original: 孤独を知らないこの街には
subtitles.english: To this city that knows no loneliness

subtitles.original: もう二度と帰ってくることは
subtitles.english: I probably won't be able to

subtitles.original: できないのでしょう
subtitles.english: return ever again

subtitles.original: いくらでも迷いながら
subtitles.english: While getting lost as much as we want

subtitles.original: いくらでも迷いながら
subtitles.english: While getting lost as much as we want

subtitles.original: 光も影も見に行こう
subtitles.english: Let's go see both light and shadow

subtitles.english: Sing and let me hear

subtitles.original: この話の続き
subtitles.english: the continuation of this story

subtitles.original: 連れて行って
subtitles.english: Take me away

subtitles.original: 見たことない星まで
subtitles.english: to a star I've never seen

subtitles.original: 世界の端と端を
subtitles.english: Connecting the edges of the world

subtitles.original: 結んで
subtitles.english: Together

subtitles.original: 壊れていたのは 世界でしょうか
subtitles.english: Was it the world that was broken?

subtitles.original: 間違っていたのは 世界でしょうか
subtitles.english: Was it the world that was wrong?

subtitles.original: あなたには朝がやってこない
subtitles.english: Morning doesn't come for you

subtitles.original: だから あなたの「おはよう」はもう聞けない
subtitles.english: So I can't hear your "Good morning" anymore

subtitles.original: 時が戻れば なんて思いながら
subtitles.english: While thinking, "If only time could go back"

subtitles.original: 私はあなたを こんな檻に閉じ込めてる
subtitles.english: I'm locking you up in a cage like this

subtitles.original: 声が枯れるまで 歌い続ければ
subtitles.english: If I keep singing until my voice gives out

subtitles.original: きっと 気がついてくれるよね
subtitles.english: Surely you'll notice me

subtitles.original: またいつか 光の降る街を
subtitles.english: Again someday, in the city where light falls

subtitles.original: 手を繋いで歩きましょう
subtitles.english: Let's walk hand in hand

subtitles.original: 空の青さを忘れるなんて
subtitles.english: To forget the blueness of the sky...

subtitles.original: 全く本当にあなたは馬鹿ね
subtitles.english: ...you really are a fool
